title: Video: Soft Bullets – Hyperreality
body: Using clips sent into them by fans, Bournemouth / Portland two piece [Soft Bullets](http://www.facebook.com/softbullets) have crafted this rather lovely video for _Hyperreality_. Awash with grainy, slow motion footage, it fits the languid mood of the accompanying track. So the **Radiohead** inspiration is fairly prominent, most noticeably in the strained, poignantly imperfect vocals, yet on sheer quality alone, it wouldn’t appear to out of place on **_In Rainbows_**. Check out the video belo.
